task.summary: Default task
GameInput module supports several players
Hotzones implemented. Player now has to put his finger close to previous position in order to move.
Players cursor are displayed on the screen
Game now has 2 players (supports up to 4)
Soldiers fight and heal each other
Added GPLv3 License
Removed useless classes and added classes descriptions
Implemented obstacles and basic obstacles drawing
Set up classes for pathfinding
More pathfinding
Changed min API level to 9
More pathfinding 2
Fixed fighter updating position
NOT WORKING : Path algorithm doesn't always return the good path
Made sure path is only recalculated when necessary
Fixed compareTo
Removed unused data structure
Implemented Squads to group up Fighters
Basic working version with pathfinding. Squads splitup is not yet handled.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Basic working version with pathfinding. Squads splitup is not yet handled.
